item.title: Sep 16th, 2011 - 5 generations of success
item.description:
Sep 16th, 2011TruePikachu
                 #  
   --------------|- 
   |..............+ 
   |.......@......| 
   |..............| 
   +..............| 
   |..............| 
   ----------------

a - a red stone

b - a green stone

c - a blue stone

d - a yellow stone

@ What a strange place to find some gems!

        --|----     
        |@....|     
        |.....|     
        -------

5 gold pieces.

e - 4 silver arrows

@ I don't have any use for these arrows, as I don't have a bow...

    -------|-----   
    |...........|   
    |...........|   
    |...........|   
    |...........|   
    |...........|   
    |.......@...|   
    -----+----|--   
              #

f - a ruby ring

g - a sapphire ring

h - an emerald ring

@ I hope these rings aren't cursed...

      #             
      #             
 -----|--------     
 |............|     
 |............|     
#-.....@......|     
 -------+-+----

i - a diamond

j - a pearl

@ Yay! More gemstones! But why are they always appearing in piles like this?

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
       +@###########

@ I wonder what's behind this door...

                    
                    
 -------            
 |.....|            
 |.D...|            
 |....@-############
 |.D...|            
 +.....|            
 -------

@ Shoot!

         -------    
         |.....|    
         |.%...|    
         |.....-####
         |.%...|    
         +@....|    
         -------

@ Well, that was difficult.

         -------    
         |.....|    
         |.%...|    
         |....;-####
         |.%...|    
 +#######-@....|    
         -------

@ I hope nothing else attacks me...

    ------------    
   /  REST IN   \   
  /    PEACE     \  
 /                \ 
 |     Dudley     | 
 |   killed  by   | 
 |   a Magikarp   | 
 |                | 
)|(|)(|\///|\\\/\))/

@ You are kidding me!

http://alt.org/nethack/dudley/
5 generations of success

item.title: Sep 14th, 2011 - Ever consider the feelings of the monsters?
item.description:
Sep 14th, 2011freg90
      The Liches    
      Aim Wands Of  
      Death         
  |........L......| 
  |...............| 
  |..........L....| 
  |...L....@...L..-#
  |......_.L......| 
  -----------+-----

L : We , the league of sentient monsters , demand this madness to end, 

      The Arch      
      Lich Clears   
      It's Throat   
  |........L......| 
  |...............| 
  |..........L....| 
  |...L....@...L..-#
  |......_.L......| 
  -----------+-----

L: The gnomes , dwarves , shopkeepers , orcs ,and goblins agree that the tresspassing of your human race into this realm is causing imbalance , poverty , and more importantly , death.

      The Liches    
      Zap Wands Of  
      Death         
  |........L......| 
  |........|......| 
  |........|.L....| 
  |...L----@---L..-#
  |......_.L......| 
  -----------+-----

L:And so , we are going to end this problem , starting with you , as you are the weakest human who has ever existed in the course of history and my minions need the exp.

http://alt.org/nethack/dudley/
Ever consider the feelings of the monsters?

item.title: Sep 13th, 2011 - When Chuck Norris ascended, he killed all the other gods so there is only him left.

You succeed in openi
      ---...---     
    ---.......|     
   --..|..[...|     
   |.@--......--    
   |...-.......|    
   ---........--    
     --.|)..-.*-    
      ---.--...|

@: "Ugh. Starving to death and all I have is this tin!"

Chuck Norris hits!  
You die ...--more-- 
    ---.......|     
   --.@|..[...|     
   |.@--......--    
   |...-.......|    
   ---........--

      ---.--...|

  /    PEACE     \

/|/|/((|\/)\/|\)|)|/

When Chuck Norris ascended, he killed all the other gods so there is only him left.

item.title: Sep 12th, 2011
item.description:
Sep 12th, 2011Nightpenguin
                    
--------------------
|.......@..........|
|..................-
|..................|
|..................|
|..................|
|..................|
------|--------|----

Hello, Dudley, and welcome to Hunt the Wumpus!

You are in room 1, with tunnels to rooms 3, 8, and 16.

You hear rustling.

@ "huh?"

                    
--------------------
|.......@..........|
|..................-
|..................|
|..................|
|..................|
|..................|
------|--------|----

@ Inventory.

a - a bow

b - 5 custom super anti-evil Wumpus arrows

@ "That's all I get? Heh, better than nothing. Moving out!"

              #     
              #     
 -------------|-----
#-@.B..............|
 |B................|
 |.................|
 ------|------------
       #            
       #

You move to room 16.

Humongous bats pick you up and move you!

@ "Aaugh!"

The giant bat grabs you! You feel a wrenching sensation!

     ---------      
     |.......|      
     |.......-      
     -.......|      
     |@......|      
     |.......|      
     |.......|      
     |.......|      
     -------|-

The bats drop you in room 5!

You smell the stench of the evil Wumpus!

@ "Fire an arrow through room 14 and then to room 6!"

The arrow can't find a way from room 14 to 6 and flies randomly into room 5!

Idiot! You've shot yourself!

It locks on to your latent telepathy!

     ---------      
     |.......|      
     |.......-      
     -.......|      
     |@----q.|      
     |.......|      
     |.......|      
     |.......|      
     -------|-

The wumpus appears from nowhere!

The wumpus breaths sleep gas!

You pass out from the stench!

The wumpus hits!

You die...

http://alt.org/nethack/dudley/

item.title: Sep 4th, 2011 - Nethack: Repercussions of Evil
item.description:
Sep 4th, 2011Muffles
       --...|       
       |..G.--      
       --....|      
    ----..@..--     
    |.........|     
    --.......--     
    |........|      
    |....--.--      
    ---------

The gnome reads a scroll of earth!--More--

The ceiling rumbles above the dwarf! The dwarf is hit by a boulder!--More--

The dwarf is killed!

       --000|       
       |.000--      
       --000.|      
    ----..@..--     
    |.........|     
    --.......--     
    |........|      
    |....--.--      
    ---------

@ "I'm trapped!! No! I must kill the gnomes!"

       --000|       
       |.000--      
       --000.|      
    ----..@&.--     
    |.........|     
    --.......--     
    |........|      
    |....--.--      
    ---------

& "Hallo, Dudley! I have some mail for you!"

V - a stamped scroll

       --000|       
       |.000--      
       --000.|      
    ----..@..--     
    |.........|     
    --.......--     
    |........|      
    |....--.--      
    ---------

As you read the scroll, it disappears.

There is a message on this scroll. The message is from "Joson"

It reads: "No Dudley. You are the gnomes."

       --000|       
       |.000--      
       --000.|      
    ----..Z..--     
    |.........|     
    --.......--     
    |........|      
    |....--.--      
    ---------
http://alt.org/nethack/dudley/
Nethack: Repercussions of Evil

item.title: Sep 3rd, 2011
item.description:
Sep 3rd, 2011TwilightMidna
...}}T}--+--------.}
.....}}|.....d.>.|}}
.......|......@..|..
..}.}..|.........|}.
}}.}...|....TT...|}.
}}.}.}.|........;|}}
}...}.}-.........|.@
}......-.........|..
}.}...}-----------}}

@ "Well, would you look at that? It's a bunch of frost trolls... guess they must be the mutant offspring of rock trolls and ice trolls, or something. And an electric eel, I guess..."

d "Technically, since we're far underground, in an area full of lava, these creatures shouldn't exist without melting into puddles. And that eel should be at least well-done by now."

...}}.}--+--------.}
.....}}|.....d.>.|}}
.......|......@..|..
..}.}..|.........|}.
}}.}...|....}};..|}.
}}.}.}.|.........|}}
}...}.}-.........|.@
}......-.........|..
}.}...}-----------}}

Suddenly, Dogley's logic becomes universal law!

The frost troll melts! The frost troll melts! The frost troll melts! The frost troll melts! The lava causes the water to evaporate. The electric eel flops over into the pool of water!

...}}.}--+--------.}
.....}}|.....d.>.|}}
.......|......@..|..
..}.}..|.........|}.
}}.}...|....};...|}.
}}.}.}.|.........|}}
}...}.}-.........|.@
}......-.........|..
}.}...}-----------}}

d "...Wow. I knew I was smarter than your average dog, but I didn't know I was so smart that my reasoning could actually force things into happening..."

@ "I guess even you have to learn something every day."

http://alt.org/nethack/dudley/
